title: Amazon, Robinhood, Disney: Stocks That Defined the Week
sub_head: Here are seven major companies whose stocks moved on the weekâ€™s news
body:
Amazon . com Inc.
Big Tech is facing new vulnerabilities. Amazon reported on Thursday a slight slowdown in e-commerce sales, highlighting the challenge of sustaining its outsize growth as pandemic shopping habits evolve. Meanwhile, Apple Inc. is contending with the ongoing chip shortage that the company said will likely worsen supply constraints, and Facebook said it expects revenue growth to slow in the second half of the year. Amazon shares fell 7.6% Friday.
